content: --भंगः --भांगिः --गी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} drawing lines or figures of painting on the face and person with fragrant and coloured substances, such as musk, saffron, sandal-juice, yellow pigment &c., as a mark of decoration; कस्तूरीवरपत्रभंगनिकरो मृष्टो न गंडस्थले <ls>Ś. Til. 7</ls> (used frequently in <ls>K.</ls>).
